title: Clytie - describing her "words" instead of quoting

content.question: By describing Clytie’s “words” (sixth paragraph) rather than quoting them, the author primarily

choices.label: reveals the sense of peace that follows Clytie’s release
shows Clytie’s growing sense of self-awareness

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
